Federated Learning Security

research

Byzantine-resilient federated learning for secure cross-institution collaboration

Steganography & Information Hiding

research

Published research in steganographic methods using PVD, LSB, and modulo encoding

  • PVD + LSB + Modulo Encoding implementation
  • NIST SP 800-90A CTR_DRBG with AES-128
  • Channel optimization for reduced distortion
  • Testing across 131 images with 10 message sizes each
Python OpenCV NumPy PyCryptodome AES-128 scikit-image
Key Achievements
  • ‚≠ê Published in Springer LNNS (vol 285)
  • ‚≠ê 1,310 embedding trials evaluated with PSNR, MSE, SSIM
  • ‚≠ê Novel PVD+LSB+Modulo combined encoding

Research Contributions

SignGuard: Novel FL Defense System

Developed a multi-layer defense system combining ECDSA signatures, anomaly detection, and dynamic reputation scoring for federated learning.

note
Theoretical design - empirical evaluation pending implementation of attack simulation benchmarks
Performance

SignGuard design combines cryptographic verification with Byzantine-robust aggregation (Krum, Multi-Krum) and reputation-based filtering

ECDSA PyTorch Flower Cryptography Reputation Systems
